dr.evomodel.coalescent
Class CoalescentSimulator

java.lang.Object
  dr.evomodel.coalescent.CoalescentSimulator

public class CoalescentSimulator
extends java.lang.Object

Simulates a set of coalescent intervals given a demographic model.

Method Detail

simulateTree

public SimpleTree simulateTree(Tree[] subtrees,
                               DemographicModel model,
                               double rootHeight,
                               boolean preserveSubtrees)
Simulates a coalescent tree from a set of subtrees.

Parameters:
subtrees - an array of tree to be used as subtrees
model - the demographic model to use
rootHeight - an optional root height with which to scale the whole tree
preserveSubtrees - true of subtrees should be preserved
Returns:
a simulated coalescent tree

simulateTree

public SimpleTree simulateTree(TaxonList taxa,
                               DemographicModel model)
Simulates a coalescent tree, given a taxon list.

Parameters:
taxa - the set of taxa to simulate a coalescent tree between
model - the demographic model to use
Returns:
a simulated coalescent tree
